## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5f663df30b939e46c2ebd664fc1dae15c177895427b67b8b2b3d646b000bc64f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'rehype-headerless-table-plugin' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
